<@UEBG0NPDK> Lookin' good! BTW, this reply to your tweet comes from a good friend and frequent collaborator whose studio has considerable expertise in UX. I wanted say so here so as to recommend engagement. :slightly_smiling_face:
<https://twitter.com/stphnthiel/status/1339681401604624384>

attachments.fallback: <https://twitter.com/stphnthiel|@stphnthiel>: <https://twitter.com/ibdknox|@ibdknox> This looks amazing and very powerful! We’re currently thinking about similar approaches to making interaction with data more human friendly <https://nand.io/projects/spotti> Would be great to exchange ideas
